> "well-formed XML" meaning all the tags open and close properly, and so on.
> "DTD/XML schema conformant" meaning that the document conforms to a 
> DTD/XML schema.

I think the second one is called a "valid" document. So a "Valid" XML document
is "Well Formed" and is "Schema/DTD conformant".
